author: ehu
msg: We can't marshall NULL in log files, meaning that we need to
pass a different value which is recoded to NULL. For filenames,
the appropriate value seems "" which isn't valid on any filesystem.
Reset the conflict files by sending "".  Also, the pre-loggy code
set timestamps to their wc-values; use SVN_WC__TIMESTAMP_WC to
accomplish this through the log file.
as NULL for conflict and property-confict files.
